title: Updated Client Re-install
body: So there was a problem of "Reinstall the League alpha client" thing and i removed the new client's ".exe" and launched the old administrator one thinking that the same pop up window will appear just like when i first installed the new client. But, it didn't work out as i thought, it's making me reinstall the old client's files (as i'm writing this). I hope there's a way to fix this, thank you...

replies.body:
It sounds like your client noticed that some files were corrupted or needed to be repaired. If you interrupt the download, it could cause more files to become corrupted which would give you even more troubles. 

At this point, it's best to wait and let the patcher do it's thing.
